title: Seoul Station’s Necromancer - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Alternate World   Antihero Protagonist   Apathetic Protagonist   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Army Building   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Clever Protagonist   Dark   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Dungeon Master   Dungeons   Evil Protagonist   Familiars   Famous Protagonist   Game Elements   Grinding   Guilds   Handsome Male Lead   Honest Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Leadership   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Naive Protagonist   Necromancer   Overpowered Protagonist   Pets   Polygamy   Returning from Another World   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Selfish Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Skill Books   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Strong to Stronger   Succubus   Summoning Magic   Terrorists   Weak to Strong

description:
[You have entered the dungeon at Gwachun Station’s 1st Exit.]
When former high school student Kang Woojin finds himself returned back to Earth after being forcibly summoned to a foreign planet for 20 years, he soon finds that Earth is not the same, normal place as he once remembered it to be.

With his former strength and age reset back to zero, watch Kang Woojin as he gets back on the path to becoming the Earth’s strongest Necromancer!>
